ownerships.owner: DT Marks Products International Member Corp.

familyMemberEthics.description: Former member/president of DT Marks Products International LLC. Trump retains an ownership interest. The company reportedly has no independent value or income, and exists to hold license deals that are prospective, inactive, or that otherwise do not currently have valuable assets or create income.
